author: abcoathup
content:
Sorry.  My fault for using a list of stars from wikipedia as the list to choose from and validating with Grok AI.
Whilst I think it is too late to change.  I don't want to get into bikeshedding.  If ACD want to make the change next week, lets get it done.
We just need a star name and a portmanteau ASAP so we can get on with choosing fork focus and headliners for H-star + BogotÃ¡.
For I-star I'll ensure the list gets more scrutiny so we don't have this happen again.

author: leobago
content: We have a name (**Heze**), and already created the poll for the Portmanteau. Hope we can get it all done for Monday. https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/h-star-name-for-consensus-layer-upgrade-after-glamsterdam/24298/18 ðŸ’ª

author: leobago
content:
Not at all, <@365300888354422794>, thank you for your work, and sorry for causing a delay. 
In some sense, this is kind of my fault, because I have been checking on this for years and I never took the time to write it down or to expose it in any way. 
So, to fix that I have wrote this post, I hope it serves as a minimal guideline moving forward: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/establishing-a-minimum-standard-for-ethereum-consensus-layer-star-names/27132
